message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go down to $100. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $130. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $130 is closer to what I'm looking for, I'm still hoping to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $120? This would allow me to purchase the product while staying within my financial limits.
